meal_plans.meal_name: Quinoa Buddha Bowl with Roasted Sweet Potatoes, Black Beans, and Avocado Cilantro Sauce
researched_ingredients: 1 medium sweet potato, peeled and cubed
1 (15-ounce) can black beans, drained and rinsed

shopping_tips: Ensure to check for any sales on these items that might be around the $16.20 budget to stretch your budget further.
Quinoa is often found near other grains in the store. Canned beans are usually with the other canned goods.
Look for pre-packaged kale and cilantro to save time, if desired.
Consider purchasing only whatâ€™s on sale or in bulk to optimize costs.
